SharedRegions

Class RepairArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • SharedRegions.RepairArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoungeRA, ManagerRA, MechanicRA

    public class RepairArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManagerRA, MechanicRA, LoungeRA
    Repair Area Class. Used by Manager and Mechanics.

        Initialize General Repository Information

      • carsWaitingForParts

        private volatile MemFIFO<java.lang.Integer> carsWaitingForParts
        Cars waiting for parts

      • rangeCarPartTypes

        private int rangeCarPartTypes
        Range of the IDs of car types

      • statusOfCars

        private volatile int[] statusOfCars
        Array of car's status. Index represents the id of the car and the value the state of the car.

      • carParts

        private volatile int[] carParts
        Array of number of carParts to be used. Index represents the id of the car. Value represents the number of parts available.

      • maxCarPartsNumber

        private volatile int[] maxCarPartsNumber
        Max stock possible for each car part Index represents the id of the part

      • carNeededPart

        private volatile int[] carNeededPart
        Array with the id part type. Index represents the id of the car. Value the needed part for the repair.

      • workToDo

        private volatile boolean workToDo
        Flag announcing work left to do

      • carsNeedsCheck

        private volatile boolean[] carsNeedsCheck
        Array with a flag announcing if a car needs to be checked for missing part. The index of the array is the ID of the car

      • reserveCarPart

        private volatile int[] reserveCarPart
        Array that is -1 if a car doesn't have a car part associated with it, and the ID of the part, to reserve that part to a specific car (index is the ID of the car).

      • allDone

        private volatile boolean allDone
        Flag announcing if all the tasks were done

      • finish

        public volatile boolean finish
        Finish flag

    • Constructor Detail

      • RepairArea

        public RepairArea(int totalNumCars,
                  int rangeCarPartTypes,
                  int[] carParts,
                  int[] maxCarParts,
                  GriRA gri)
        Instantiation of the Repair Area.
        Parameters:
        totalNumCars - number of the total number of cars
        rangeCarPartTypes - range of the IDs of car types
        carParts - array of number of carParts to be used. Index represents the ID of the car and value represents the number of parts available.
        maxCarParts - max stock possible for each car part. Index represents the ID of the part
        gri - general repository information object.

                         int partId,
                         int mechanicId)

        Specified by:
        repairCar in interface MechanicRA
        Parameters:
        carId - The Id of car to repair.
        partId - The Id of the car part needed for the repair.
        mechanicId - Id of the mechanic doing the task
        Returns:
        true ready for repair. False otherwise
